message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9000. I think this is a fair price considering its worth to you.

Thanks for the offer, Alice!  I appreciate you recognizing the value of the product to me. However, $9000 is a bit more than I'm willing to pay at this time.  I'm ready to offer you $8500 for it.  Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still a bit above my minimum target. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $8750. It's a fair price considering its value to you and my initial offer.
